sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { mockFacilities, mockESGData } from '../../utils/mockData'; import { Building, TrendingUp, Users, MapPin, Calendar } from 'lucide-react'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell } from 'recharts'; export const AdminDashboard: React.FC = () => { const [selectedFacility, setSelectedFacility] = useState(null); const totalFacilities = mockFacilities.length; const avgESGScore = Math.round( mockFacilities.reduce((acc, facility) => acc + facility.esgScore, 0) / totalFacilities ); const avgDataCompletion = Math.round( mockFacilities.reduce((acc, facility) => acc + facility.dataCompleteness, 0) / totalFacilities ); const chartData = mockFacilities.map(facility => ({ name: facility.name.split(' ')[0], esgScore: facility.esgScore, completion: facility.dataCompleteness })); const pieData = [ { name: 'Excellent (90+)', value: mockFacilities.filter(f => f.esgScore >= 90).length, color: '#074D47' }, { name: 'Good (70-89)', value: mockFacilities.filter(f => f.esgScore >= 70 && f.esgScore < 90).length, color: '#22867C' }, { name: 'Needs Improvement (<70)', value: mockFacilities.filter(f => f.esgScore < 70).length, color: '#89E4DA' } ]; const selectedFacilityData = selectedFacility ? mockFacilities.find(f => f.id === selectedFacility) : null; const selectedESGData = selectedFacility ? mockESGData[selectedFacility] : null; return (

Admin Dashboard

{new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

Total Facilities

{totalFacilities}

Avg ESG Score

{avgESGScore}

Avg Completion

{avgDataCompletion}%

Active Today

{mockFacilities.filter(f => f.lastUpdated === new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0]).length}

ESG Performance Overview

Performance Distribution

`${name}: ${value}`} > {pieData.map((entry, index) => ( ))}

Facility Overview

{mockFacilities.map((facility) => (
setSelectedFacility( selectedFacility === facility.id ? null : facility.id )} >

{facility.name}

{facility.esgScore}
{facility.location}
{facility.manager} {facility.dataCompleteness}%
))}
{selectedFacilityData && selectedESGData && (

{selectedFacilityData.name} - Detailed Metrics

Environmental
Emissions (tons CO2) {selectedESGData.environmental.emissions}
Energy (MWh) {selectedESGData.environmental.energy}
Water (gallons) {selectedESGData.environmental.water}
Waste (tons) {selectedESGData.environmental.waste}
Social
Employees {selectedESGData.social.employees}
Safety Score {selectedESGData.social.safety}%
Community Score {selectedESGData.social.community}%
Diversity Score {selectedESGData.social.diversity}%
Governance
Compliance {selectedESGData.governance.compliance}%
Ethics Score {selectedESGData.governance.ethics}%
Transparency {selectedESGData.governance.transparency}%
Board Diversity {selectedESGData.governance.boardDiversity}%
)}
); };
